<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">

<link rel="preconnect" href="https://www.google-analytics.com">

    <title>Ceneo - porównanie cen, sklepy, perfumy, agd, rtv, komputery</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Porównywarka cen Ceneo.pl - znajdź produkt oraz sprawdź i porównaj jego cenę w sklepach internetowych. Perfumy, AGD, RTV, komputery, laptopy, fotografia">
    <meta name="keywords" content="Porównywarka cen, Ceneo, sklepy internetowe, Biuro i firma, Biżuteria i zegarki, Budowa i remont, Delikatesy, Dla dziecka, Dom i wnętrze, Fotografia, Gry, Hobby i zwierzęta, Komputery, Księgarnia,">
    <meta name="robots" content="index,follow">

    
    
    

    
<script>
    var errorManager = (function() {
        var errors = [];

        function _createErrorObject(msg, fileName, error) {
            return {
                name: error ? error.name : '',
                message: msg,
                fileName: fileName,
                url: window.location.href,
                stackTrace: error ? error.stack : ''
            };
        }

        function _preserveError(error) {
            if (false === true) {
                var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
                xhr.open('POST', 'https://www.ceneo.pl/ssl-PreserveConsoleError', true);
                xhr.setRequestHeader('X-Requested-With', 'XMLHttpRequest');
                xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json;charset=UTF-8');
                xhr.send(JSON.stringify(error));
            }
        }

        return {
            logError: function(msg, fileName, ln, cn, error) {
                var errorObj = _createErrorObject(msg, fileName, error);
                if (errors.length < 10) {
                    errors.push(errorObj);
                    _preserveError(errorObj);
                }
                return false;
            },
            getErrors: function() {
                return errors.concat();
            },
            hasErrors: function() {
                return !!errors.length;
            }
        };
    }());

    window.$logError = errorManager.logError;
    window.$getErrors = errorManager.getErrors;
    window.$hasErrors = errorManager.hasErrors;

    window.onerror = errorManager.logError;
</script>

            request.onload = function () {
                if ((request.status == 200) && (request.readyState == 4)) {
                    eval(request.responseText);
                }
            };
            request.timeout = 5000;
            request.send();
            try { t.cookie = u.cookie } catch (h) { } for (t.queue = [], i = ["Event", "Exception", "Metric", "PageView", "Trace", "Dependency"]; i.length;) r("track" + i.pop());
            return r("setAuthenticatedUserContext"), r("clearAuthenticatedUserContext"), config.disableExceptionTracking || (i = "onerror", r("_" + i), f = e[i], e[i] = function (config, r, u, e, o) { var s = f && f(config, r, u, e, o); return s !== !0 && t["_" + i](config, r, u, e, o), s }), t

            samplingPercentage: 2,

            disableCorrelationHeaders: true
        });
        window.appInsights = appInsights;

<script>
    (function (w) {
        if (!w.require)
            throw new Exception('Require.js missing.');

        var requireConfiguration = '';
        var requireDeps = [];

        var extend = function(base, obj) {
            'use strict';
            for (var i in base) {
                if (base.hasOwnProperty(i)) {
                    obj[i] = base[i];
                }
            }
        };

        var contains = function(list, el) {
            'use strict';
            for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
                if (list[i] === el)
                    return true;
            }

            return false;
        };

        var addDependency = function (dep) {
            if (!contains(requireDeps, dep)) {
                requireDeps.push(dep);
            }
        };

        var removeDependency = function (dep) {
            var idx = requireDeps.indexOf(dep);
            if (idx > -1) {
                requireDeps.splice(idx, 1);
            }
        }

        var __require = w.require;
        w.require = function(deps, callback, errback, optional) {
            'use strict';
            var requireCall = function () { return __require(deps, callback, errback, optional); };
            var requireBundle = requireDeps.length ? function () { return __require(requireDeps, requireCall); } : requireCall;
            var requireConfig = !!requireConfiguration ? function () { return __require([requireConfiguration], requireBundle); } : requireBundle;

            return requireConfig();
        };

        w.require.configure = function(config) {
            requireConfiguration = config;

            __require([config], function () { requireConfiguration = undefined; });
        };

        w.require.addDependency = function (dep) {
            addDependency(dep);

            w.require([dep], function () { removeDependency(dep); });
        };

        extend(__require, w.require);
    })(window);
</script>
